ai-patthana17.12:0.2_0: (This should be expanded as in the teachings.)
ai-patthana17.12:0.3_0: Standing on the basis, he based on the self.
ai-patthana17.12:1.1_0: only a little bit of teaching is not unskillful. Form is a cause or reason.
ai-patthana17.12:2.1_0: expansive teaching arises dependent on the skillful. On the support is a condition for the arising of thought.
ai-patthana17.12:3.1_0: Passiveness arises dependent on the skillful and unskillful. On the support is a condition for the arising of thought.
